TopicTitle: Project Centaur: To Duna and beyond

Articles.Content:
Yeah, I made a program called Project Centaur (Multiple missions) and it turned out to be good things and bad things. Sad things and glad things. You got what I'm saying, right?

Anyway, It was a program that made a really (I'm saying REALLY) big rocket that goes to Duna. Usually it's capsules carries the MK-1-3 or whatever it is, and I even got a bunch of kerbals over there (No screenshots due to the screenshot button is broke)

So the last mission (The second to last) was with Jebediah, a kerbal named Billy Something (can't remember) and Zach (Yeah. Zach.) and they all went to Duna together. Mission success, came back to Kerbin. So badbutt.

Now the next two missions are going to Laythe or to orbit around Minmus. So yeah thats my mission success and that stuff.
